title: Save Your Tears (Remix)
author: The Weeknd, Ariana Grande
lyrics:
[00:02.18] Ooh (ooh)
[00:05.05] Nah-nah, yeah
[00:08.53] I saw you dancing in a crowded room (uh)
[00:12.73] You look so happy when I'm not with you
[00:16.58] But then you saw me, caught you by surprise
[00:20.85] A single teardrop falling from your eye
[00:25.05] I don't know why I run away (oh, oh, oh, oh, oh)
[00:33.47] I'll make you cry when I run away (oh, oh, oh, oh, oh)
[00:40.92] Take me back 'cause I wanna stay
[00:45.31] Save your tears for another
[00:48.31] Save your tears for another day (oh, oh, oh, oh, oh)

[01:05.57] Met you once under a Pisces moon
[01:09.62] I kept my distance 'cause I know that you
[01:13.82] Don't like when I'm with nobody else
[01:18.03] I couldn't help it, I put you through hell

[01:38.02] Boy, take me back 'cause I wanna stay
[01:42.43] Save your tears for another
[01:46.03] I realize that it's much too late
[01:50.48] And you deserve someone better
[01:53.65] Save your tears for another day (oh, oh, oh, oh, oh)
[02:01.99] Save your tears for another day (oh, oh, oh, oh, oh)
[02:10.94] I don't know why I run away (bum, bum, bum, bum, bum)

[02:32.19] Ooh, girl (oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, okay)

[02:42.50] Save your tears for another day (oh, oh, oh, oh, oh)
[02:50.53] Save your tears for another day (oh, oh, oh, oh, oh)
[02:58.87] Save your tears for another day
